metadata.synopsis: Hag AD for when players kill one of her mushrooms that allow her to resurrect.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Debugbook option "Act3 → LOW - Auntie Ethel's Revenge → Skip to hag combat- Kill one of the hag mushrooms

0.speaker: Auntie Ethel
0.text: Argh - those fungi are worth a thousand of you, you pissant!
0.context: NodeContext: angry (player has destroyed one of the mushrooms that lets her regenerate)

1.speaker: Auntie Ethel
1.context: NodeContext: angry (player has destroyed one of the mushrooms that lets her regenerate)

2.speaker: Auntie Ethel
2.text: If I wanted my growths seen to, petal, IT WOULDN'T BE YOU I'D CALL.
2.context: NodeContext: angry (player has destroyed one of the mushrooms that lets her regenerate)
